confirm_empty_trash: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all items in the trash?
info_desc: Items in the trash are kept indefinitely, but we recommend periodic cleaning for optimal database performance. Restoring an employee also returns their status to "Active".
permanent_delete_confirm: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone!
